runs.comm: good length outside off stump, McCullum pushes it into the covers
good ball! A lifter outside off stump, bounce and movement suckers McCullum up on his toes and then shaves past his bat, well bowled
shot! Quick, short and wide outside off stump, slightly cramped for room but McCullum is just too quick on it, and uppercuts it over point for four to get the innings going
short and wide again, McCullum backs away and flays the bat at it, but cant make contact this time
and again its just too short and wide outside off stump, but McCullum cant get bat to it even though he gave it the kitchen sink
good length outside off stump, McCullum gets up on his toes and pokes at it with an open face of the bat, gets the edge that flies wide of third slip, and picks up four as there was no third man
wide ball to start off with, pitches full and wide outside off stump and deviates too much
full and swinging away outside off stump, Fleming gets half forward and then leaves it alone

full on off stump, Fleming looks to work it into the on side but doesnt time it, and gets an inside edge towards Dilshan at point, McCullum calls for the run and just makes it as Dilshan's throw comes in
bang! Full and wide outside off stump, McCullum picks it up and slams it over mid-off off the backfoot for four
wide, way down the leg side
good length ball outside off stump, McCullum drives it to mid-off
full and wide outside off stump and McCullum gives it everything he has, leaning back, getting under it, and splicing it high over backward point for four
and again! Pitched up outside off stump, McCullum launches forward and drives it to deep extra cover for four more
good quick delivery on the stumps, Fleming falls over as he tries to defend and gets an outside edge along the ground to point
good length delivery on the stumps, Fleming comes on the front foot and plays it back to the bowler
full and moving down  leg stump, Fleming goes for the flick but doesnt time it, ends up clipping the pad and McCullum calls for the run and gets it
short and wide, 150ks, rising too but McCullum cant get bat onto it as he opts for a lavish uppercut
good length delivery outside the off stump, McCullum goes on the backfoot and slaps it to deep backward point
a bouncer is the reply! Well bowled! Quick on middle and leg, forces McCullum down onto his haunches as it sails over his left shoulder
half-volley outside off stump, and Fleming just slams that handsomely over mid-off for four, stand and swing shot that was
shorter outside off stump, Fleming looks to slap it over point, the ball hurries on him but he's timed it so well nevertheless that it sails over cover for four, innovation there!
fuller length delivery on the off, Fleming comes on the frontfoot and drives it to mid off
good length delivery angling into the left-hander, seaming away, Fleming looks to slam it over the leg side, but misses
SHOT! Fuller length delivery on the stumps, Fleming comes on the frontfoot and drives it straight down the ground, shot of the day so far!
good ball, lands outside off stump and swing over the top of the stumps, and Fleming suprisingly leaves it be, that was close but guess he's pretty confident of where his off stump is
banged in on a short of a length, McCullum ducks at just about the right time and the ball sails over him
short and wide, McCullum flays his bat at it but misses, and its called wide anyways
back of a length delivery outside off stump,McCullum opens the face of the bat and plays that to gully
short outside off stump, and he smacks it across the line through mid-on for four, was a tennis forehand shot that!
Malinga digs in the bouncer, a bit too high, and McCullum goes for the pull, misses, and Sangakkara jumps as high as he possibly could have, but the ball is beyond his reach
good, swinging yorker just outside off stump, McCullum's feet go nowhere, he stands and drives at it and misses, super delivery
fuller length delivery on off stump, McCullum comes on the frontfoot and plays it back to Malinga
full outside off stump, Fleming gets onto one knee and mistimes the square drive to Dilshan at backward point
a good length outside off stump, no room to cut but Fleming tries anyway, and gets beaten
good length on off stump, Fleming comes forward and drives to mid-off but cant beat Silva there

banged in short on middle and leg, Fleming tries some sort of pull shot, not timed well but he was under it and got enough on it to send it over the infield, and it bounces just inside the deep mid-wicket ropes and goes over

gone! A good length delivery outside off stump and Fleming goes for an expansive drive, was a bit late on the shot, and ends up skies skying it over point and Kapugedera takes a well-judged catch out in the deep
short of a length delivery outside off stump, McCullum goes for the cut, misses
tossed up on middle and leg, Taylor works that to mid-wicket
tossed up again and he plays across the line, cant beat mid-wicket

a low full toss on the stumps, Taylor comes forward and flicks to mid-wicket, calls for the run, and McCullum just makes it to the other end, that throw was good and Sangakkara did well to get off the bails, but McCullum was just in
tossed up on off stump, McCullum comes on the frontfoot and plays it to silly mid off
tossed up on the stumps, McCullum comes forward and defends
flatter and moving down leg, McCullum shuffles and works it in front of square but cant beat the fielder
tossed up on off stump, driven loosely to cover
a touch short of length outside off, McCullum goes on the backfoot and cuts it to point, straight to the fielder
tossed up outsid off stump, McCullum comes down and drives, the ball spins away from him, Sangakkara whips off the bails but McCullum gets the back leg back inside the line just in time, well bowled
short of a length outside off stump, McCullum goes back and cuts it square of point for one
flighted delivery on middle and leg, Taylor comes on the frontfoot and flicks it to mid wicket
short of a length delivery outside off, McCullum goes on the backfoot and cuts it to point
tossed up on the stumps, Taylor comes forward and plays it back to Dilshan

run out! Tossed up on middle and leg, Taylor comes down and and flicks it away, looks for a second, McCullum is not interested, Taylor keeps running and is out by a mile, sad end for him, Sri Lanka strike again!
tossed up down the leg side, McCullum goes on the backfoot and glances it to short fine leg
flighted delivery on the stumps, Astle comes on the frontfoot and turns it to short mid-wicket
flatter on leg stump, Astle goes on back and glances it to short fine leg
another run out! Madness! Tossed up on middle and leg, Astle turns it to the onside, McCullum sets off down the track but Astle says no and New Zealand have anothe run-out mess on their hands
fuller length delivery on the off, Fulton comes on the frontfoot and drives it to cover
short of length delivery outside off, Fulton goes on the backfoot and pushes it to sweeper cover
flighted delivery down leg, Astle kneels down and sweeps it to fine leg
fuller length delivery on middle and leg, Fulton comes on the frontfoot and drives it to long-on
short of a length outside off stump, Astle goes for the cut and misses
tossed up down leg, Astle goes on the backfoot and turns it to square leg
flighted delivery on off stump, Astle comes on the frontfoot and plays it back to the bowler
flatter on leg stump, worked past square leg and they run well
flat on middle and leg, Fulton comes forward and drives past mid-on for one
flat again but on middle and off, Astle goes back and works it to mid-wicket
short and wide outside off, Astle goes on the backfoot and cuts it to deep backward point
flat down leg stump, he tries to work it fine but cant time it well&
tossed up on leg stump, Fulton drives to mid-on
shot! Tossed up on off stump, Fulton gets to the pitch of it and drives that straight down the ground past mid-off for four
flighted delivery outside off stump, Fulton reaches for it and punches it to the sweeper cover
tossed up on the stumps, Astle gets the foot out of the way and slams it, golf-like, between the nonstriker and the stumps for four, super shot
quicker through the air, pitches on off stump, Astle drives back to Bandara
short of a length delivery outside off stump, Astle goes on the backfoot and cuts it square for a brace
and bowls a good ball first up, pitches it outside off stump and gets it to stand up, Fulton plays a nothing shot and gets beaten

where did that come from?? Holy mackerel!! Banged in short on middle and leg, and Fulton swivels on one foot and hooks it superbly over deep backward square leg, and thats so far back it lands up in the balcony somewhere!
good length delivery on the stumps, Fulton shuffles across and tries to tap it away, ends up with an inside edge onto the pads
fuller outside off stump, Fulton comes forward and drives it straight down the ground, Fernando does well to get a finger to it and take the pace off it
short of a length delivery on the stumps, Fulton goes on the backfoot and looks to pull it away, misses and gets hit on the chest
gone! Full and swinging into him, Fulton doesnt pick it well and has an ugly swipe across the line, eyes not on the ball at all, and his stumps are re-arranged, Sri Lanka strike again!
tossed up on off stump, Astle defends back to Bandara
quicker outside off stump, Astle backs away and cuts it wide of point for one
looped up outside off stump, McGlashan comes forward and pushes to cover
flatter on middle and leg, he picks it up and flicks around the corner to short fine leg
short of a length delivery outside off, Astle goes on the backfoot and cuts it to point, straight to the fielder
flatter outside leg stump, he shuffles across and tries to flick it, ball clips the pads
good length on leg stump, worked off the hips wide of square leg
full and wide of off stump, he comes down the track and swings wildly at it and misses all ends up
shorter on off stump, Astle tries to pull but doesnt time it well, does get bat on it and it trickles past short fine leg

another one bites the dust! Simple catch! Banged in short outside off stump, McGlashan is taken by suprise and defends loosely on the hop, the ball takes the shoulder of the bat and loops up in the air, and all point has to do is take a few steps forward and accept the easiest of chances
short of a good length outside off stump, hurries into him but he plays it well withs soft hands to gully
full outside off stump, slower too, and Franklin drives to the offside loosely
full outside off stump, too much width, and its slow to boot, 126ks, and Astle slams it hard over mid-off four four
quicker and it moves in from outside off to tuck Astle up, but he does well to work it to square leg
strives for the yorker on leg stump, Franklin drives to mid-on
full and wide outside off stump, Astle has an ugly swing at that and fails to make contact...zip, zero, nada, nothing....
banged in short again, again he has a swipe and gets bat onto it, but can only chop into the ground for Perera to collect in his followthrough, but even he cant take it and gives up a run...ho ho ho
fuller length delivery on the stumps, Franklin comes on the front foot and turns it to short mid-wicket
full outside off stump, Astle makes room and drives expansively, but cant beat mid-off
good length on leg stump, an eager-beaver Astle swings at it and bottom-edges into the square leg region
short outside off stump, Franklin chops to cover, they set off, Atapattu is slow and cant get the pick-and-throw in time, and a sluggish Astle is home clear

thats the four he's been eyeing! Slow and full on the stumps, Astle moves his front leg out of the way and slams it bang smack down the ground, a couple bounces and over the ropes, pressure relieved now
whats the reply? A bouncer! Quick on middle and leg, forces Astle down onto his haunches
full on middle and leg, Impetuous Astle swipes across the line and mistimes it out to a wide mid-on, agricultural farming type of batting this...Twenty20 on Boxing Day, would you believe it?
hoo hah! The lengths all wrong for his chap, drops it short outside off stump and Astle picks it from where it lands and smokes it over mid-on for four, sweet!
fuller length delivery on the off, Astle goes for the booming drive, but gets the outside edge down to third man, great effort by Atapattu saves two runs
short and wide outside off stump, Astle's cramped for room but carries through with the back-foot slam, and luckily for him it goes over mid-off and lands safely
fuller length delivery on off stump, Franklin comes on the frontfoot and drives it to extra cover
bye bye birdie! Insane hit that! Full outside off stump, and Astle picks it so well, just sends it sailing miles and miles over wide long-on, thats so far back into the stands, wow, wow, wow!
slower and fuller outside off stump, Astle looks to square drive it but doesnt time it well, the ball bobs up and drops outside off stump, McGlashan calls for the mad single, and the scores are tied!
tossed up outside off stump, he drives but gets an inside edge to mid-wicket
tossed up outside leg, he tries to loft it for four but doesnt make contact
all over! Tossed up on middle and leg, Astle gets down and sweeps through square leg for one, and New Zealand have tied the series!
